content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received human feedback requesting a cooperative AI opponent or ally for League of Legends and instructions for programming in English. The latest development was receiving further feedback from the user, who expressed a desire to create an AI for fun and to improve gameplay. They suggested looking to AI players in DotA2 for inspiration and noted the need for the program to run on Windows or Mac. My latest action was receiving a blank command from the user.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Human feedback: i do not have any experience with machine learning or data analysis, so you will have to explain to me in simpler terms for a while, until i pick up. i know general concepts, but i haven't been using any of this in my day-to-day operations so i don't have any depth to it. as far as replays - i think we can download a lot of my replays where i can highlight a good player for instance, whether enemy or from my own team, and tell to focus on learning from that? maybe highlight mistakes too? would that work?"}]
"""
